channel.title: Randoms on Information Set Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Randoms on Information Set Blog

item.title: Quotes
item.description: “The size of your dreams must always exceed your current capacity to achieve them. If your dreams do not scare you, they are not big enough.” ― Ellen Johnson Sirleaf Poor people need more money, not self-help tricks. Quotes by Albert Einstein It’s not that I’m so smart, it’s just that I stay with problems longer. The only thing more dangerous than ignorance is arrogance. Try not to become a man of success but rather a man of value.
